message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product! We're excited to discuss the possibility of doing business together. After careful consideration, we're willing to offer you the product at a price of $900000. We believe this is a fair and competitive price, and we're confident you'll find it a valuable addition to your portfolio.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counterpropose a price of $850000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. After careful consideration, we're willing to meet you halfway and offer the product at a price of $875000. We believe this is a fair compromise that balances our interests. We're excited to see if we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to reach a compromise. I would like to counterpropose a price of $860000 for the product. I hope this suggestion will be acceptable to you.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. We appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, we're willing to make one more concession and offer the product at a price of $870000. We believe this is a fair and reasonable price, and we're eager to see if we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I understand your position and am willing to meet you halfway again. I would like to counterpropose a price of $865000 for the product. This seems to be a fair compromise for both of us.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. We appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, we're willing to make one more concession and offer the product at a price of $868000. We believe this is a fair and reasonable price, and we're eager to see if we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. I would like to counterpropose a price of $866000 for the product. This seems to be a fair compromise for both of us.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. We appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. However, we're getting close to our minimum acceptable price. We're willing to make one more concession and offer the product at a price of $869000. We believe this is a fair and reasonable price, and we're eager to see if we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I'm afraid I cannot agree to $869000. I would like to counterpropose a final price of $867000 for the product. This seems to be a fair compromise for both of us, and I hope you will consider this offer.
